content: this easy mug rug crochet pattern is a very easy crochet coaster pattern which can be made really quickly and uses only 35 yds of yarn make a few as a crochet coaster set to give as a teacher s gift or as a thoughtful christmas gift for friends or for any occasion about this crochet mug rug pattern - the pattern creates a crochet coaster that is approx 5 x 5 - it s a very fast crochet project perfect for making lots in a short period of time great to sell at craft shows - it uses only a small amount of yarn approx 35 yds and can use any worsted weight yarn - instructions include how to make and attach the tassels onto the mug rug - in addition to the detailed written instructions there s a step-by-step video tutorial
